bill.title: Department of Direct Care and Treatment and Office of Human Services Licensing and Integrity created, duties transferred from Department of Human Services to new state office, commissioners of health and human services directed to contract with third party to administer grant programs administered by Department of Health and Department of Human Services, commissioner of human services directed to contract with third party to review appropriations for information technology projects, performance-based budgeting provided for Department of Human Services, and reports required.
bill.description: Department of Direct Care and Treatment and Office of Human Services Licensing and Integrity created, duties transferred from Department of Human Services to new state office, commissioners of health and human services directed to contract with third party to administer grant programs administered by Department of Health and Department of Human Services, commissioner of human services directed to contract with third party to review appropriations for information technology projects, performance-based budgeting provided for Department of Human Services, and reports required.

history.action: Introduction and first reading, referred to Human Services Policy
